page.title: 03PRINCIPAL FEATURES
page.content: Near this house is a very small building which also used to be a chapel a few hundred years ago. Behind this building there is a big rock called{Black Rock}which is a familiar landmark. Not far away there is{Crowan Beacon}which is 800 feet above sea level. The church in{Crowan Village}was first of all built in sections. A church or chapel has existed on the site since the 13th century. It is the centre point of Crowan Parish. The chapel in Burras hamlet was built in 1923 but the nearby Wesleyan Sunday School dates from 1889. Just across the field there is a{standing stone.} There are many of these stones dotted around the Cornish countryside. They are believed to be ancient burial sites or places of worship.
